description: Implementation of mechanics and UI in Unity, collaboration with a multidisciplinary team (programmers, sound designers, game designers, artists), version control using GitHub, and workflow management with Trello, Asana and Clickup

Participation in multiple game jams, contributing to the development of small-scale games in Unity. Responsible for implementing gameplay mechanics, interactive systems, and puzzles under time constraints, collaborating closely with designers and artists using GitHub for version control.

Implementation of interactive elements, particle effects, and animations in Unity; collaboration within a development team; version control using GitHub; and testing and optimizing code for performance.
